title: Range Rover Evoque 2024 launched at Rs 67.9 lakh with petrol and diesel options. Here are details
description: Jaguar Land Rover launches the updated Range Rover Evoque 2024, priced at Rs 67.9 lakh. The luxury SUV features an updated design, new features, and two engine options. It includes a 19-inch touchscreen display, dual-zone climate control, heated and cooled front seats, wireless charging, and a cabin air purifier. The Evoque comes with advanced camera systems, premium LED headlights, and a panoramic sunroof. It is available in petrol and diesel variants, both equipped with a 48V mild-hybrid system and a 9-speed automatic transmission. The SUV offers various driving modes.
